title: 5 Technical JavaScript Trends You Need To Know About in 2025
author: Alexander T Williams
description: JavaScript in 2025 will see advancements in serverless architectures, integration with WebAssembly, adoption of microfrontends, and more.
cntitle: 2025年你需要了解的5个JavaScript技术趋势
cndescription: 2025 年的 JavaScript 将在无服务器架构、与 WebAssembly 集成、微前端的采用等方面取得进展。
